content: skill level easy level 2 2 balls lb collection® baby alpaca article #488 or lb collection® angora merino article #491 crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm cowl is worked in rounds each round consists of 2-double_crochet groups alternated with shells first 10 rounds are worked from foundation chain second 10 rounds are worked in the opposite direction starting from the foundation chain creates scallops on both edges of cowl pattern is written and charted available in different lion brand yarns 90268ad 1 corrections applied apr 17 2013 *added chart and clarification notes * size 10 x 21 in 25 5 x 53 5 cm *488-125 lb collection baby alpaca yarn fawn heather* l30177 2 november 2013 size 6-1/2 x 21 in 16 5 x 53 5 cm *491-108 lb collection angora merino yarn blue bonnet* 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/90268ad html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/l30177 html
